section.title: Demonstration 1 Main Page

content.text: This demonstration covers a simple non-recurring purchase order (PJ), creation of an estimate accrual (EA) and linking it to the asset record. It provides a step-by-step guide for linking the asset record and changing the asset accounting line for partial accrual amount. It demonstrates the following key concepts: How to change accounting line amounts on an estimated accrual with fixed asset records. How to change asset accounting line amounts to ensure they total full amount of the estimated accrual.

content.text: Select the Header Accounting Lines tab.
The Header Accounting Lines page appears
Select the first Header Accounting line.
Select the Header Accounting Line link, so we can enter the Amount to be accrued.
The first Header Accounting Line is displayed.
Select the second Header Accounting Line.
The second Header Accounting Line displays.
We will accrue $50,000 on this line too.
Enter $50,000 - the amount of this Asset Accounting Line we will accrue.
Select the other Asset Accounting Line.
If there are no errors, click the Submit button.
